text: Anyone have experience integrating the Facebook Conversion API with Zapier? What exactly do I have to pay attention to?

:wave: Hi everyone! Glad to be here. I have a question if anyone can help. I've created an app using my dev account. And created a test user. When my test user is installing the app, after the first prompt the second one redirects too fast and I cannot catch it. Nonetheless, I have that app listed in my connected apps on the Test user.
When I try to create workflow I do not see that app in the list and cannot find it. I've created custom action for my app using postman, and I got 201 response. So that part should be fine. But I still cannot see my app in the workflow. Can anyone help with this issue?
HubSpot takes care of http to https redirects for you, and thereâ€™s also a non www to www redirect in HubSpot now too

Is your scope using "content" under the legacy portion?

From HubSpot Private App
Content
This includes sites, landing pages, CTA, email, blog, campaigns.
What api endpoint did you use to fetch that page? The docs are quite vague with how to do that.
